page.title: 14TRACTION ENGINE RALLY
page.content:
At the Traction Engine rally they have a big ring for all the cars,buses,traction engines,steam rollers and carts and Shire horses to go round.
They have the gallopers which are model horses and chickens which move up and down while going round in a circle. It is worked by steam engines.They also have swing boats and the speed way. They have little toy trains going round giving rides.
The Traction Engine rally takes place on August Bank Holiday weekend. The engines and other vehicles come from all over the country to take part.
